text: Tau-gu with John Wesley Powell, near the Virgin River, ca. 1873"Nature, Culture, and History of the Grand Canyon: Southern Paiute." Arizona State University. (retrieved 7 Nov 2011 Tau-gu was a headman of the Southern Paiutes in Arizona in the 1870s. ==Notes== Category:Native American leaders Category:Paiute people Category:People of the Arizona Territory Category:19th- century Native Americans
title: Tau-gu
